author: neilg
msg: docs updates reflecting extensions to build file.

author: neilg
msg: enable compression of jar files.  Also, added a new build target for factoring out WML/HTML DOM; this gets xercesImpl down to 430K!  Finally, refactored some of the more egregious common code in the various targets, but more could be done here.

author: neilg
msg: used by the dtdjars build target, this file serves as the XMLParserConfiguration file in META-INF/services.

author: neilg
msg: add a new build target, dtdjar, for constructing a DTD-only xercesImpl.  Also added dtdjars to build the full set of jars with this one included.
